title: Magic Face C2-Halloween
summary: Tap the little pumpkin head ,magic happens !
description: Happy Halloween holiday!Interactive watch face. The funniest Magic face ever !Tap the little pumpkin head , you could see interesting thing happen!More facesIf you like interactive watch face C2-Halloween, feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the original watch faces created by Magic team are here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platformSupported Devices:Face  C2-Halloween supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.Note:Please rate us positive if you like our work.Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately. Tips:✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).2. Uninstall the face.3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.4. Finally install the face and select “resync apps”in settingsAttention:- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.Contact us:If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:magicwatchface@gmail.comOr join our community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809Web:http://www.magicwatchface.com/Twitter：https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface Thank you for :We really appreciate for you downloading our app. We look forward to adding to our free & premium Magic Watchface line.
descriptionHTML:
Happy Halloween holiday!
Interactive watch face. The funniest Magic face ever !
Tap the little pumpkin head , you could see interesting thing happen!

More faces
If you like interactive watch face C2-Halloween, feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the original watch faces created by Magic team are here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platform


Supported Devices:

Face C2-Halloween supports all Android Wear smart watches, which include Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.

Note:

Please rate us positive if you like our work.

Don't give us a bad rating too soon if you experienced a problem. Please, send us an email with details, we will be really happy to answer it and fix it as soon as possible.

Our Email: magicwatchface@gmail.com
Seeing more details please refer the below “Contact us”

Besides, we do really understand sometimes for some reasons our faces might not work well on your watch. DON’T WORRY, If you still don’t know how to set it, please let us know and we will help with it immediately.


Tips:

✔ Sometimes you need to wait for App to be matched to watch (which might depend on your phone condition and Android Wear version.)
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after installing for a couple of mins, then you could try re-sync it, or follow the below steps:

1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone).
2. Uninstall the face.
3. Restart watch and connect to your phone again.
4. Finally install the face and select “resync apps”in settings

Attention:

- ONLY supports Android Wear 5.0 and higher version.

Contact us:
If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:
magicwatchface@gmail.com

Or join our community:
https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809

Web:
http://www.magicwatchface.com/

Twitter：
https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface


Thank you for :
We really appreciate for you downloading our app. We look forward to adding to our free & premium Magic Watchface line.
comments: Nice but inconvenient. I love this watch face but I hate that there is no option to switch from 24hr time to 12hr. Thats my only complaint. Besides that this is an amazing watch face.
Nice watch face but lacks some options I agree with most everyone else. You need to give the option between 12 and 24 hr formats.
Great face Would like to see some customization.
Someone call Whine-one-one and get the whaaambulance Bunch of adults who still can't read 24 hr format time. Get over it. Nice watch face!
